name: Big Run Solitaire
description:
Welcome to Big Run Solitiare a Brand New Klondike game where you can win Real World Rewards and Cash Prizes (where available)! Use your smarts and fast finger skills to beat the clock and your opponent.

Historically, solitaire was often frustrating with difficult controls and impossible to beat decks.

But now you can flick and swipe with ease to complete ANY deck as every game is solveable! Could you be a Solitaire Genius?

Key Features:
• Swipe and Flick with easy controls
• Games range from 2 to 5 minutes depending on how bold you are feeling
• Beautiful graphics
• Powered by Skillz, earn real world rewards and cash prizes (where available)
• Earn special card streaks to maximize your score
• Beat the clock for the highest scores!

If you have any questions about the game, feel free to contact us at contact@bigrunstudios.com

If you have any questions about the Skillz platform please contact: support@skillz.com
